title: Promised pause in Gaza fighting brings relief, exhaustion, fear
description: “Of course we are happy to stop the bloodshed and mass destruction, even if this stop is temporary,” one man said, but added: “This joy is linked to anxiety.”

title: Live updates: Two people dead after car crashed, exploded at border checkpoint in Niagara Falls, N.Y., law enforcement officials say
description: A person familiar with the investigation said there was no immediate evidence of any nexus to terrorism, but officials continue to investigate and their understanding could change.

title: FBI investigating vehicle explosion on U.S.-Canada bridge
description: The Rainbow Bridge explosion came on one of America’s busiest travel days and as security officials have expressed heightened concerns about possible attacks.

title: Inside the hard, circuitous route to a hostage release deal
description: Five weeks of stop-start negotiations, pushed by the Biden administration, led to the Israel-Hamas agreement to pause combat operations and trade Palestinian prisoners for an initial 50 women and children held captive.

title: How pressure from hostage families nudged Israel toward a deal
description: Hostage families appear to have persuaded the once-reluctant Israeli government to pause its assault on Gaza to bring some of their loved ones home.

title: After Israel-Hamas deal, an agonizing wait for the release of captives
description: The deal still needs to be vetted by Israel’s Supreme Court and the fighting and waiting continued for a 46th day as bombs continue to fall across the Gaza Strip.

title: Israel-Gaza war live updates: Israel and Hamas agree to hostage exchange deal, 4-day pause in fighting
description: Qatar confirmed the deal and said an initial 50 hostages held in Gaza will be released in exchange for a number of Palestinians detained in Israeli prisons.

title: He proposed in a bomb shelter. They died together in a Russian strike.
description: A young romance in Ukraine started as a distraction from the horrors of war. Its tragic end is an example of the staggering human cost of Russia’s invasion.

title: Israel has utterly devastated Gaza
description: There are glimmers of a reprieve in the Israel-Gaza conflict, but nothing can erase the trauma already unleashed.

title: Merle Goldman, noted scholar of Chinese intellectual dissent, dies at 92
description: Ms. Goldman became a leading expert in interpreting China’s staggering changes over more than six decades.
